segments.text: Do you have air ticket and claim tag ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then , would you fill out this PIR from ? And also we need your signature here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How soon would you deliver my baggage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hopefully by tomorrow evening.Which hotel are you going to stay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At the down town Hilton Hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When is the expected date of your departure ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to return next week .
segments.speaker: S1
